pages.title: Companion Emotes
pages.text: Your companion can express emotions with particle effects and sounds.$(br2)Available emotes:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Wave$() — Friendly greeting$(li)$(bold)Celebrate$() — Firework particles$(li)$(bold)Sad$() — Blue dripping particles$(li)$(bold)Angry$() — Red fire particles$(li)$(bold)Love$() — Heart particles$(li)$(bold)Thinking$() — Enchanted particles$(li)$(bold)Sneeze$() — Cloud particles$(br2)The AI triggers emotes naturally during conversation, or you can ask directly: "Do a celebration!"
